content: skip 4 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into next st 2 chain skip 4 st 4 double_crochet* repeat from * until the second last st 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet middle 1 double_crochet *4 double_crochet 2 chain skip 4 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into next st 2 chain skip 4 st 3 double_crochet* repeat from * until the second last st 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet into last st 18 stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 49 double_crochet + 20 chain per side + 2 chain in the middle 18th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet into 1st st 2 double_crochet *1 double_crochet 1fpdc 2 chain skip 5 st 3 double_crochet 1 chain 3 double_crochet into next chain-space 2 chain skip 5 st 1 fpdc 2 double_crochet* repeat from * until the fourth last st 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 chain skip 1 st 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet middle 1 chain skip 1 st 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet *2 double_crochet 1 fpdc 2 chain skip 5 st 3 double_crochet 1 chain 3 double_crochet into next chain-space 2 chain skip 5 st 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet* repeat from * until the 4th last st 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 chain 1 treble_crochet into last st stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 42 double_crochet + 22 chain + 9 fpdc per side + 2 chain in the middle 19th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 2 double_crochet into 1st st 2 chain skip 2 st 1 bpdc 1 double_crochet *1 bpdc 2 chain skip 4 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the middle double_crochet from the 3 double_crochet below 1 chain skip 3 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the middle double_crochet from the 3 double_crochet below 2 chain skip 4 st 1 bpdc 1 double_crochet* repeat from * until the 6th last st 1bpdc 2 chain skip 4 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet 2 chain 1 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet middle 2 chain skip 4 st 1 bpdc *1 double_crochet 1 bpdc 2 chain skip 4 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the middle double_crochet from the 3 double_crochet below 1 chain skip 3 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the middle double_crochet from the 3 double_crochet below 2 chain skip 4 st 1 bpdc* repeat from * until the 6th last st 1 double_crochet 1 bpdc 2 chain skip 2 st 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet into last st important note on this row the textured stitches in this row are bpdc unlike the previous row where they were fpdc so that the final result in the right side is always fpdc raised stitches stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 42 double_crochet + 33 chain + 10 bpdc per side + 2 chain in the middle 20th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 1 double_crochet into 1st st 1 chain 1 double_crochet into next st twice 2
